title: I'm still confused...hows Akali and Fizz now???
body: Anyone help me? I'm confused as to how they should be played now...

replies.body: i feel like the range nerf on her ulti will piss me off eventually.

In lower elos, probably means absolutely nothing.

Fizz and Akali are still strong enough to do what they do. Just they have more counterplay/weaknesses when it comes to people who know how to exploit weaknesses (higher elo players).

http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2tx1ng/fizz_changes/ -  Challenger NA Fizz Main

I have versed a few fizz's since the nerf, they havnt gone very well at all.
All have lost lane to me, i mostly think its because they dont utilize the fact that "Chum the Waters" has a Ap Steroid, basically if you dodge Chum their damage potential plummets. No Ulti no damage at all.
The fact that her E can't proc Q hurts her pre-6 right? I hardly proc her Q with my AA anyway, I always proc it with my ult...
you cant proc her q with her ult

> [{quoted}](name=RonyStark,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=H4BTEBVM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-29T05:58:52.865+0000)
>
> you cant proc her q with her ult

o_O

What have I been doing all these years...
akali, the same way as before.
